1.post_text:
Let’s make a difference. 

In support of Earth Hour, we’re switching off more than 70% of lights in ALL our restaurants from 8.30pm – 9.30pm this evening and we’d like you to join us. 

But remember – we also need to go green beyond Earth Hour. 

Visit https://www.mcdonalds.com.sg/our-stories/earth-hour-and-beyond/ to see how else we’re doing our part for the environment and find out how you can too! As our founder, Ray Kroc once said, “None of us is as good as all of us”.

Can you tell me this pic is of which outlet in Sg?? According to NEA rules u can't touch cooked or ready to serve food by bare hand.
HANDLING AND SERVING PRACTICESOperators of food establishments should ensure that all service staff are aware of and follow proper food handling and serving practices to prevent contamination of food. The service staff should:a. Turn away from food and cover their noses and mouths with tissue paper or handkerchieves when sneezing or coughing. Wash their hands thoroughly after sneezing or coughingb. Do not touch cooked or ready-to-serve food with bare hands when serving food. Care should be taken to ensure that their thumbs or fingers are not in contact with the food.c. Always use tongs, ladles or spoons to handle cooked, ready-to-eat food or cut fruits. When necessary, wear disposable gloves when handling cooked, ready-to-eat food or cut fruits. Discard the gloves after each use.d. Handle crockery and utensils by the base, handle or areas that are not in contact with food. Ensure that crockery and utensils are not dirty, chipped, broken or cracked.e. Do not touch the inside and rim of cups or glasses. Use a food tray when serving drinks.

9.post_text:
Made with 100% chicken breast meat, each piece of chicken is battered twice to lock in the meat’s moisture. This means that what you get is nothing short of yummy goodness - crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside. 

Each piece of mouth-watering crispy chicken is then topped off with wild rocket, shredded lettuce and juicy tomato slices, before being tucked in a fluffy semolina bun. It’s the taste experience you’ve been craving for.

Enjoy the best of both world’s at McDonald’s® today! Visit http://goo.gl/XclFPx to find out more.

comments.message: had it yesterday, salmon tasted like... flour and prawn flavor? No trace what so ever of the paella spices, the breading was too thick and soggy. Lettuce was quite old and not very clean. the best part for me was the mayo in it and the bun to an extent. Very disappointing indeed
Fail for me! The patty is very thin. Can't taste the salmon. Bread was a little dry. Like the greens only.
Have this for lunch today (@ Raffles City Outlet), amazed to find that the fish patty is of white meat, I expect this to be pinkish if this is from Hokkaido.
the bun is good, the salmon is not bad and lettuce is crunchy but the sauce is not up to standard, should use some other sauce like honey mustard for example.

I mean, I wasn't expecting much from it, and I wasn't disappointed or surprised.The bun tastes better than the patty, which tastes like a bastardized mix between the filet o fish and some prawn burger.

Not one bit of salmon-y taste in it, sorry to say.

17.post_text:
The buns that complete our new Breaded Salmon with Paella Spice Mix burger are full of hearty goodness! Each bun is topped with 4 different types of grain – oat flakes, rye flakes, linseeds and sunflower seeds. 

Add the mouth-watering flavours of wild-caught salmon from Hokkaido, paella spice mix and crisp salad, and you’ve got yourself a truly mouth-watering taste experience. 

Enjoy the sumptuous goodness at McDonald’s® today!

Visit https://goo.gl/L17BzO to find out more.

comments.message: Not nice...fishy smell...

Hi McDonald's, I really wish you could come out with some varieties of vegetarian burgers for the vegetarian community rather than trying so hard on a not-so-"salmony" wild catch salmon burger. 

Nice marketing strategies on the choice of words for the new product though. It considered a success that so many comsumers have tried it and given their comments!

You sure it's wild-caught? Last time I checked, wild salmon meat is red in color because of the krill they eat in the wild. Farmed ones are the ones with meat that's orange in color with distinct white layers of fat.
1st, bring the cost of ur meals down, including breakfast. Too expensive..

Tried it last night, it tasted "meh". 
$7.50 for a meal.
It tasted like a "fishier" version of filet o fish.
I can't taste the salmon, although it has the texture of a salmon.
Can't expect too much, end of the day its still fast food.
I don't think I would go back for round 2, it just isn't that awesome.

Was excited to try out this new burger..hoping tat it will be like the prawn burger..
Quite disappointed coz i taste more of the spice mix than the salmon..no taste of salmon..even though there are pcs of salmon in the patty.. Nt goin for another one 😣

May I also take this chance to feedback on your ice milo. I've visited united sq, serangoon gardens and amk garden branches for their ice milo. Its really diluted and no taste. Now we don't buy your ice milo anymore... On 1 instance, we returned the diluted one and asked for a replacement and that was fine. But... Why wait until the customer returned and asked for a replacement then you gave a normal sweet milo?
Taste is spicy, crispy, a bit of texture, a tad diff from fillet o fish. The crisp salad mix is just lettuce and 1 piece of rocket leave. Would be nice with a slice of cheese and more sauce ;)
Worse burger frm mcd i ever tasted! Lettuce is so not fresh & no salmon taste at all. Disappointed
I would like to try a Mcdonald's Grilled Salmon fillet sandwich without the fried breaded coating that's advertising now....

For those who havent tried it, it just some flakes of salmon, with too much spice and coated with flour and deep fried, all you taste is crunchy flour and spices even though you can see the pink salmon flakes

i would like to say... 

The New Dreaded Salmon. or.

The New Flourded Salmon.

the patty only taste better when just up from deep fryer.
it gets hard once stored in warmer. take note mcdsg.
the spices taste totally covered the salmon taste.
the patty might need to ton down the spices strong taste.
Note the key words: made with. It doesn't mean that it's pure salmon. Even if it's 1 percent salmon and 99% anything else, it's still made with that salmon.

Salmon on sashimi or baked in  butter sauce ...
Never deep fried sounds wrong and disrespectful to Salmon !

Tried it at mac forum today for lunch. Had an extra ingredient of a plastic wrapper inside! Totally wasn't waiting to have a plastic wrapper in my burger. And anyway it's not very nice, agree with the fishy smell.
The salmon should be the star in this burger, yet the spice and the capsicums inside overpowered it. I'm a little disappointed tbh.

i like the bread n the many vegetables. the salmon patty can be improved though. it was so loose that i think salmon was not 80% of the patty. The taste of salmon was overwhelmed by the other "duno" ingredients
we need double salmon since one salmon does not make me full. so last time I ordered two breaded salmon~~~ so we need double salmon just like double mcspicy~~
Not bad , indeed a Spanish delight , well still can be improve ,maybe mustard with extra mayonised might help for the taste.
Not worth it the salmon when take away the flour u can even see how many small bits of meat in there
the salmon looks like salmon, but doesn't taste like salmon, or anything at all
Only can find a small piece of salmon mixed with other fish..
Sure it's wild and not farmed salmon?? Cannot be..
there was no paella spice mix ..the patty was cold and soggy ,so was the bread and the lettuce was very dry

18.post_text:
Made with wild-caught salmon from Hokkaido, each delicious Breaded Salmon Paella patty is flanked by crisp salad mix and topped with a touch of McChicken sauce. All perfectly sandwiched between two wholesome multigrain topping buns. It’s the sumptuous goodness you’ve been waiting for.

Indulge in the new Breaded Salmon with Paella Spice Mix today. Find out more at http://goo.gl/YnAhbS

I think the McDonald's restaurant model should be made available for sale as an individual model. It's not fair to those who didn't get the collector's kit. 

I mean, even Malaysia had it sold separately. Why can't we?
i dont know why the hype over this and im too afraid to ask now..

The logistics and ordering for these toys should be better managed. The inefficiency in managing the demand and supply for these toys are allowing for opportunists to abuse the system by allowing them to buy these toys for resale at jacked up prices on Carousell & other platforms. This is highly unfair to your genuine customers who made the effort to visit multiple stores to realise that it's already sold out last evening. Feels like a marketing gimmick for these limited edition products to create an inflated demand for the toys that Mcs are producing for the next run. :/

Should have more stock to last till 28 Feb if you really want the promotion to last till that date... Selling the whole set is better then selling it as individual as most people wants to collect the whole set... No point collecting the individual one if the collection is not complete. Maybe you should consider to release the whole set again instead of the solo blocks itself...

There should be a channel that allows us to purchase the items. No point for us to go to the outlet and find out its has been sold out. Limited edition should not be listed available till date. That is not possible. Should it be as while stocks last? I'm very sure that we can see the limited edition blocks on sale on carousel soon..
HOW COULD WE'VE MISSED THIS BABE Jeffrey Fong
It's impossible to please everyone. Unless they got unlimited stock or do pre orders
The model should be able to let us build it ourselves. I mean, thats the point of nanoblocks isnt it? Am disappointed to find out its a fixed display thingy.

This is really disappointing.. After so many rounds of promotions, I feel that your organisation do not have a good grasp on the market demand in Singapore despite of past experiences, data and feedback.

I don't know what's the point of stating the date till 28th Feb when it's all sold out within half the day when it was launched yesterday. It was only 11.30am when all was sold out?? And people started queuing before 10.30am to get hold of them. Seriously think it's unfair to some consumers who have to travel all the way down only to get disappointment! Please look at it as to how you all want to deal with this in future should there be any limited edition figurines or stuff like these.
Hope that for the individual ones you have enough stock for us working people...you can't expect us to take leave just so we can get a chance to buy the nanoblocks right? =n=

comments.message: Can u please seperate Mc Donald's into Halal & non halal?just like people at Kopitiam!People can choose to sit in smoking or non smoking area!Why not introduce pork sausage to mc muffin to Chinese customers?Why u force people without choices?spilt ur restaurant into two,people who r halal queue up on the left.people who are non halal queue up on right of the restaurant.Hk also hv Indonesian who work there,they r halal but know that they can't take pork sausage!
Seriously disappointed. With all the MEAT choices on your menu, thought it would be a VEGETARIAN burger this time

since I think 2-3years ago. McD has been coming up with new burgers once in a while. Some of them might not taste as good but I give credits to their creativeness. I'm still hoping they can create Hainanese Chicken flavor Burger, Nasi Lemak flavor burger, etc.

Give something new,  complain. Nothing new come out, complain. Think it's too unhealthy,  complain.  

Go and prep your own meals. Good or bad you'll just eat it. Enjoy your burgers!
I paid for the salmon price only to receive fillet o fish patty in there.. How do u compensate this?
It taste better than i expected. The veggies and mayo was so little but overall its not that bad.

Is Punggol waterway Mcdonald a franchise shop or it is under the same chain of Mc Restaurants ? 

It is the worst Mcdonald I have ever seen in SG. It was ridiculous! 

2weeks ago, I went there in the evening. It ran out of buns. All customers cannot buy burgers. Only wings or nuggets.
*This is my 1st encounter with a fast food selling burgers running out of buns. 

Last week I went for breakfast at 6am, there are around 6 staffs & a total of 6 customers. We have to wait for 20mins to get our breakfast sets. 

Few days ago, I went again. Waited for 1 hour to get our dinner. And The system is chaotic. Queue system was down. Staffs are shouting the Q numbers instead. Orders are mixed up. The queue at the ordering counters had stopped taking in orders for awhile as the kitchen cannot cope with orders. But no notes are pasted on the machines to inform customers on this, so people continue to order. 

You can imagine the customers of eat in & take away, all are waiting for foods. Yet the Mac staffs at the open kitchen isn't as 'anxious" as the waiting customers. They look very 'lost' and actions are quite slow. Can understand that they might have tried their best to cope with the in-surge of orders. Perhaps it was a long busy day for them too. 

BUT please do not start the machine ordering with Q system if Mcdonalds cannot handle the crowds/orders! Also, You are seriously understaffed! 

3 times, time and again. So much Disappointment!

McDonald's at Jurong pont has too many spot lights. 1 row of light directly above the seats backed to the wall and another row of lights directly above the centre of the tables. There is no air conditioning vent above these seats. As the ceiling have a false ceiling with the row lights.
Sitting under these seats always make me feel hot and sweaty. I've talked to the manager in charge today. And her around 9.20am and her reply was the air conditioning is centralised and only turn on at 10am. I told the manager about the lousy design of the lightings and she thank me for the feedback. Will McDonald's management look into the redesign of the lightings? Hope they will renovate and replace the spot lights to led lights.

For those who claim they dun mind deep fried unhealthy food, i hope they dun complain about high medical bills and not enough subsidies later in life. Just go and check how much it costs for a heart by pass surgery or a angioplasty stent..

I just wonder if this is going to be on the menu permanently.. Or is it just another one time promo that last for a limited time... What happened to all the other promos they use to have?? Why don't put in on the menu for good so that people can have more choices instead of those standard ones, I'm  personally and honestly getting quite bored of them already...

Disappointed with macdonalds on how they treat their older staff... My relative, who is an old aunt, was forced to resign by the restaurant manager just becos of half a cup of milo.... and when we wrote to Mac HQ, they din even bother to reply..:(
Disappointed! All I want is a simple wholemeal sandwich stuff with smoked salmon, tomato and lettuce. No need for cheddar cheese, red bull pepper etc.

I'll give it a try .... But I prefer Beef ...  I've nothing against burgers served throughout the years .... I just seriously felt that McDonald's can do something about that year after year " Black Pepper " Prosperity Burger" " Looking forward to Chinese New Year 2017 for something exciting ..
I just ordered the salmon burger via McDelivery, and it looks totally different. Order number TPC 21/02/2016-77. You may want to look into this. Thanks!

Just tried it earlier. it was AMAZING. the crisp and the selected veg made this burger a mediterranean delight! fresh salmon as well. Would probably prefer if the sauce isnt mayo thou. maybe something zesty would fit the burger better. nevertheless give it a try!
The breaded salmon burger is actually pretty tasty. Nice work on the patty but I reckon more arugula will make it even better tasting. Cup corn goes well with the burger IMO.

Had a very nice meal at Mcdonalds tonight. The burger was tender and fresh. But the fish is a bit dry and could have more moisture. The seeds do drop but only a little. Overall this burger is one of the best burger I have tasted. 9/10 rating of delicious. 1/10 of messiness when eating. Keep up the good work! :)
Many years ago, macdonald came up with this pizza pie. Its like apple pie but the filling is cheese, tomato and stuff. Super delicious. Hope Macdonald can consider making this again. Thank you

Dear Mc Donalds,

 I wish that your control of your franchisees would be stricter. I live in Singapore and some of the McDonalds stores in my area serve fries that are not freshly fried. They leave them there for some time and refry them a few times. I feel sad for what they're doing to your brand because on the wall outside one of the McDonalds is a giant banner showing your fries with the caption "The Best Fries in the World".

This had never been a problem in the past, but now whenever I go to a McDonalds store, I look at the fries to see if they're freshly fried. If they're not, I have to ask the staff for freshly fried fries, and not all of them will entertain my request. 

I hope that McDonalds can still have the best fries in the world in every outlet as I've been eating McDonalds almost every day since young.

Thank you

Justin Chua
Dear Macdonald's I remember your fillet o fish was so good... But now, the fish you use tastes so different from back then. It's no longer the burger that I crave for :(

I am going to give it a try tomorrow because I love salmon.Well eating Mcdonald is unhealthy? How about all the Char Kway Teow,Nasi Briyani,our local food? Eat everything in moderation an it will be healthy for you.When I was working at a hotel cake shop,the pastry chef always create something new and as customers,its our part to give the feedbacks.Just like Mcdonalds,they are trying out new burgers to see if customers like them.If you want healthy food,buy a cookbook and learn how to cook your own food. That is what I do,just saying...Lets just enjoy the new burger for the time being anfd give your feedbank to Mcdonalds  :D
Tried it on the first day it came out... Sooooo good. But mine only got 1 small piece of veggie -.-  Why not have double patty? I would love to get one of those 😻

Btw there is no update on my post when the staff denied my delivery order due to high volume of order and rainy conditions.The supervisor told me he escalate to higher mgtment on this issue...Apparently either he did not or the mgtment is useless or couldn't care less!
I kid u not,the new salmon burger taste just like the filet o fish.Might as well just opt for the filet o fish instead,save on that couple of dollars.Really a let down,expected much more😕😕😕
I personally like Mc Cafe staff (if I not wrong her name: Ting Ting) at Sengkang Swimming complex.  I think she is a foreign but she always provide excellent service and  Mc Cafe Coffee. Well Done!
